title: Lesson 1
text: To explore this model, we will use a case study. Our case study begins with the Washington Post Fatal Force database. Throughout the case study, historical and other contemporary data is combined to generate an original database. This database can be used for your analysis.

The Quantitative Histories Workshop Model
Prep

Case study
To explore this model, we will use a case study. Our case study begins with the Washington Post Fatal Force database. Throughout the case study, historical and other contemporary data is combined to generate an original database. This database can be used for your analysis.
